maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Cross Central

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Hau Ling

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Ah... Another bird approached me. Welcome, bird!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ah... un autre oiseau s'approche de moi. Bienvenue, petit oiseau !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Salut ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The bird is trying to find a worm, but a \c[3]bug\c[0] is what it needs to catch.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: L'oiseau essaye de trouver un vers, mais c'est un \c[3]scarabée\c[0] qu'il a besoin d'attraper.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: To the \c[3]south\c[0] is where the bird needs to fly, through \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and beyond.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: C'est vers le \c[3]sud\c[0] que l'oiseau doit voler, à travers la forêt de bambous et au-delà.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And by \c[3]a pond and a fire\c[0] it needs to land.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Et c'est près \c[3]d'une mare et d'un feu\c[0] qu'il doit atterrir.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now fly, little bird, fly and let the wind carry you.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Maintenant, vole, petit oiseau, vole et laisse-toi porter par le vent.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Wait?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Attends ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: How?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Comment ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Non, mamie. I do NOT want to catch a bug. No bugs.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Non, mamie. Je ne veux PAS attraper un scarabée. Aucun scarabée.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Fly to the \c[3]south\c[0] through the \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] or something? Maybe someone in the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] can explain.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Volez vers le \c[3]sud\c[0] à travers les \c[3]bambous\c[0] ? Peut-être que quelqu'un à l'\c[3]Auberge des Caves\c[0] peut vous l'expliquer.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Hau Ling

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: To the \c[3]south\c[0] is where the bird needs to fly, through \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and beyond.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: C'est vers le \c[3]sud\c[0] que l'oiseau doit voler, à travers la forêt de bambous et au-delà.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And by \c[3]a pond and a fire\c[0] it needs to land.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Et c'est près \c[3]d'une mare et d'un feu\c[0] qu'il doit atterrir.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now fly, little bird, fly and let the wind carry you.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Maintenant, vole, petit oiseau, vole et laisse-toi porter par le vent.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Bye...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bye...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Hau Ling

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Ah... I can feel it...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ah... Je peux le sentir...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The bird found \c[3]the pond and the fire\c[0], didn't it?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: L'oiseau a trouvé \c[3]la mare et le feu\c[0], n'est-ce pas ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Good bird. Yes, yes.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bien, petit oiseau. Oui, oui.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now you only need to catch the \c[3]bugs\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Maintenant il vous faut juste attraper les \c[3]scarabées\c[0] !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hau Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Hau Ling

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The Bird again? Hm...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Encore le petit oiseau ? Hmm...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I see the worm found the falling rock.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Je vois que l'oiseau a trouvé le rocher qui tombe.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now it can pass the grand door to the light.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Maintenant il peut passer la grande porte vers la lumière.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now, don't clip your wings my bird, yes yes.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Mais, ne range pas tes ailes, mon oiseau, non, non.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Why didn't you take the deal?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu n'as pas accepté l'offre ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: You mean the player offering real cash?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Tu veux dire le joueur qui offrait du vrai argent ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Yeah.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ouais.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Sounded \c[3]way too shady\c[0] for my taste.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ça me semblait \c[3]bien trop douteux\c[0] à mon goût.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: How?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Comment ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh hey. You mean the money thing?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh, hé. Tu parles du vrai argent ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Yeah, some dude just offered me money to deliver some kind of package.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oui, un type m'a promis de l'argent si je livrais un genre de paquet.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Just looking at his grin gave me the creeps.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Juste en regardant son sourire, ça m'a donné les jetons.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: "Money" Clue
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Indice "Argent"

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: en_US
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: en_US
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: fr_FR

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Look, there is some perfectly regular bamboo right in that river, cute.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Regarde, il y a un parfait bambou normal au milieu de cette rivière, c'est mignon.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: There's bamboo in the middle of river.\. Very regular bamboo, too.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Il y a un bambou en plein milieu de la rivière.\. Et il est très normal en plus.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Spheromancer Lea! Here you can see a prime example of perfectly regular bamboo!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Spheromancer Lea ! Ici vous pouvez voir un bon exemple de bambou parfaitement normal !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Whoa, such normal bamboo. I want perfectly regular bamboo like that for my garden, too.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ouah, qu'il est normal ce bambou. Moi aussi je voudrais bien un bambou parfaitement normal comme ça dans mon jardin.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, look! That is some lovely regular bamboo, right on that river.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh, regarde ! C'est un bambou joliment normal, juste là sur la rivière.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Can't stop, won't stop.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Peux pas m'arrêter, vais pas m'arrêter.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: He is doing it everyday.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Il fait ça tous les jours.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Says, it keeps him fit.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Il dit que ça l'aide à rester en forme.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Fit? We are inside a game, how does that work?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: En forme ? On est dans un jeu, comment ça peut marcher ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Well...\.\.\. You are as fit as you feel, I guess.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bah...\.\.\. Tant que tu as l'impression d'être en forme...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Ling Ling
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ling Ling

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The name is Ling Ling and I'm the youngest of the \c[3]Lings\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Mon nom est Ling Ling et je suis la plus jeune des \c[3]Lings\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Well, technically my brother and I are the youngest, since we are twins...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bon, techniquement mon frère et moi sommes les plus jeunes, vu qu'on est jumeaux...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: But I'm the youngest female!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Mais je suis la plus jeune fille !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So tell me about the big cities! I always wanted to go, but my mother keeps saying that I'm too young, sad.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Donc, dis-moi en plus sur les grandes villes ! J'ai toujours voulu y aller mais ma mère me dit toujours que je suis trop jeune, c'est triste.
... Salut ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh is that so? Wow, that is so cool! Please come back and tell me more, okay?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh, vraiment ? Waouh, c'est trop cool ! Il faut que tu reviennes me voir pour m'en dire plus, OK ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh...\. Nice view from up here, non?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh...\. Il y a une belle vue d'ici, non ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: This really would be such a nice location if it weren't for all those bugs...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ce serait vraiment un endroit formidable s'il n'y avait pas tous ces scarabées !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Perfectly regular bamboo
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bambou parfaitement normal

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: PuellaDocta

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Boo!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bouh !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I see you've arrived at the Cave Inn.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Je vois que tu es arrivée à l'Auberge des Caves.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now you just have to sit tight and wait for the perfect moment.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Maintenant il faut juste attendre et rester à l'affut jusqu'à que le moment parfait arrive.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Yeah, it's like Wervyn says, there's a fine line between being early, late, and right on time.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oui, comme Wervyn le disait, il y a peu d'écart entre être trop tôt, trop tard et juste au bon moment.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And you don't have our finely-tuned senses yet.\. But don't worry!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Et tu n'as pas encore nos sens aiguisés.\. Mais ne t'inquiète pas !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Since you're new, I'll let you know when it's time to move out!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Vu que tu es nouvelle, je te donnerai le signal lorsqu'il sera temps d'agir !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And I have a feeling you won't have to wait too long!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Et j'ai le sentiment que tu n'auras pas besoin d'attendre très longtemps !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Thanks again, Lea!\. PuellaDocta out!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Merci encore, Lea !\. Fin de transmission !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So...\. we have to wait?\. Okay.\. Hopefully not for too long.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Donc...\. il faut qu'on attende ?\. OK.\. Avec un peu de chance, pas pour longtemps.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hm. Didn't expect to get involved in this field of work again...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Hm. Je m'attendais pas à encore être impliqué dans ce genre de travail...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Well... I suppose waiting is all there is to do now.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bon... je suppose qu'il ne nous reste plus qu'à attendre maintenant.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: This is certainly not the most exciting task.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: C'est vraiment pas la tâche la plus exaltante.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: This is a good opportunity to just soak up the atmosphere of this place.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: C'est une bonne opportunité pour véritablement s'imprégner de l'atmosphère de cet endroit.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hm... No surprise they have trouble finding volunteers doing this kind of work.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Hmm... C'est pas surprenant qu'ils aient du mal à trouver des volontaires pour ce genre de travail.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: PuellaDocta

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea, it's time!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Lea, il est temps !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: A fellow player is in dire need in \c[3]River Road\c[0] right to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Un camarade joueur a besoin d'aide à la \c[3]Route de la Rivière\c[0] juste à l'\c[3]ouest\c[0] !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Let's be quick! Time waits for no man!\. Or woman!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Vite ! Nous n'avons pas le temps de trainer !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Lea !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Aaand...\. more waiting.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Eeet...\. encore de l'attente.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Always this waiting for the perfect moment. So bothersome.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Toujours cette attente pour le moment parfait. C'est tellement pénible.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Right...\. back on standby.\. Let us hope there will be another person to rescue soon.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bon...\. de retour en attente.\. Espérons qu'il y aura bientôt un autre joueur à secourir.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: PuellaDocta
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: PuellaDocta

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Uh...\. Lea?\. Remember that guy from before?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Heu...\. Lea ?\. Tu te souviens du type d'avant ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: It looks like he's in trouble again.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: On dirait qu'il a encore des ennuis.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Why?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Heck if I know!\. Anyway he's currently in \c[3]North East Path\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Si seulement je le savais !\. En tout cas il est actuellement au \c[3]Chemin du Nord-est\c[0] !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Better hurry!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Tu ferais mieux de te dépêcher !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Kat
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Kat

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hello, fellow seeker!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bonjour, confrère Pisteuse !
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.note: the only text where seeker is gendered in the gendered language that is german ! So here i genderize it too. Just because.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Salut !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Hm... I'm currently looking for help, but \c[3]just one person\c[0], not a whole party.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Mmmmm... Je cherche effectivement de l'aide, mais \c[3]seulement d'une personne\c[0], pas d'un groupe entier.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Just talk to me again, if you happen to be by yourself later.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Reviens juste me parler, si jamais tu te retrouves toute seule plus tard.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Perhaps you saw my posting in the Quest Hub.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Peut-être que tu as vu mon annonce au Carrefour des Quêtes.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I'm looking for some help with a little bit of...\. exploration.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: J'ai besoin d'un peu d'aide pour une petite...\. exploration.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: But there is something you should know about this first.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Mais tu dois savoir une chose avant.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Let's just say we might see a few things that no one is supposed to see.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Disons juste que l'on risque de voir des choses que personne n'est censée avoir vu.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: And in order to do this...\. we might have to break this game...\. a tiny little bit!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Et pour voir cela, nous devrons peut-être casser ce jeu...\. mais juste un peu !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, but don't worry about it!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh, mais ne t'inquiète pas pour ça !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: We'll both be fine as long as we handle it confidentially.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Rien ne nous arrivera, tant que l'on garde ça pour nous.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: We just have to make sure none of the officials learn about this.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Il faut juste qu'on fasse en sorte qu'aucun officiel ne soit au courant.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So in short: I'm looking for someone who can keep a secret.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Donc en bref : Je cherche quelqu'un qui sait garder un secret.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Now that I think about it...\. you didn't say terribly much so far, huh?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Pendant que j'y pense...\. Tu n'as pas dit grand-chose jusqu'à présent, hein ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Does that mean...\. do you have problems with your speech module?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Est-ce que ça veut dire...\. que tu as un problème avec ton module vocal ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, perfect!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh, parfait !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: That means you'll have a hard time sharing any of this in the first place!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ça veut dire que tu ne risques pas de pouvoir raconter ça à tout le monde !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: So what do you say?\. Do you want to help me?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Donc, qu'en dis-tu ?\. Tu veux m'aider ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I promise it will be exciting!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Je te promets que ce se sera marrant !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Uhm, Lea?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Euh, Lea ?

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Great!\. In that case, let's meet in \c[3]Maroon Valley - Barren Arcs\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Super !\. Dans ce cas, rencontrons-nous à la \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0], aux \c[3]Arches Perdues\c[0] !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh and just so you know, I'll need to switch my avatar.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Oh, et pour que tu le saches, j'ai besoin de changer d'avatar.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: The name will be \c[3]Kit\c[0].
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Le nom sera \c[3]Kit\c[0].

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Lea !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Oh, yes!\. Nice to meet you Lea!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ah, oui, quelle impolitesse de ma part !\. Ravis de te rencontrer, Lea !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I'll contact you via D-Link when you arrive!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Je te contacterai via D-Link dès que tu seras là-bas !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: See you soon!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: À tout de suite !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Bye!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Bye !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Logout
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Déconnexion
Lea... ?\. Tu es sûre que c'est une bonne idée ?
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Lea...?\. Are you really sure this is a good idea?
I know we have broken the rules before but...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Je sais qu'on a déjà enfreint les règles plusieurs fois, mais...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: I honestly have no idea what this player is up to.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Je n'ai absolument aucune idée de ce que ce joueur à en tête.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: [shakes head]
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Dang it...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ah, dommage...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Seems like everybody is too afraid to break the game.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: On dirait que tout le monde a trop peur de casser le jeu.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Even if it's just a little.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Même si c'est juste un peu.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: It's honestly not so bad though!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Pourtant ce n'est pas si grave ! Vraiment pas !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: That was a good choice.\. Better not get into risky business like this.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: C'était une bonne décision.\. C'est mieux de ne pas chercher à prendre des risques comme ça.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: You have to wonder how they would be able to grow the bamboo so densely...
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: On se demande comment ils font pour faire pousser les bambous de manière aussi dense...

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Maybe that's what the giant shoots around here are for.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Peut-être que c'est à ça que serve ces pousses géantes.

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: They grow into a ton of bamboo stalks!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Elles poussent en des tonnes de tiges de bambous !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: Then they make more shoots, and it creates a whole forest almost instantly!
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: Ensuite ils font d'autres pousses, et ça crée une forêt entière presque instantanément !

maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.orig: ... I was going to suggest someone out there just really likes gardening.
maps/forest/path-04-hostel.json/entities.text: ... Je voulais juste dire qu'il doit y avoir quelqu'un qui adore le jardinage.
